content.rendered:
What is EndyMed™ Sculpt ?

EndyMed™ Sculpt (3DEEP) is a skin rejuvenation procedure that uses radiofrequency energy to stimulate collagen and help smooth, lift, and tighten skin.

Get appointment
Call us 96501 44438

How does EndyMed™ Sculpt work?

Endymed is a clinically proven controlled and focused 3DEEP Technology. Its innovative 3DEEP RF technology delivers energy deep into the dermis, reaching 52 – 55C. This heat is delivered to deeper layers of collagen with minimal heating of the superficial layers of the skin, for optimal and painless collagen remodelling.

What are the effects of EndyMed™ Sculpt?

The 3DEEP technology is an excellent option for someone looking for a non-invasive anti-aging procedure. It smoothens wrinkles, lifts sagging skin and contours the face and neck.

Is it painful?

EndyMed™ 3DEEP is a perfect option for anyone who wants to have firmer, lifted skin without the down time of surgery. There is no pain and no immediate redness or irritation of the skin post procedure.

How soon can I see the results?

The results are visible over a period of four to six weeks as new collagen is produced which makes the face look more lifted.

How many sessions are required?

For optimum results we recommend at least six sessions, one every 3-4 weeks.

Get appointment
Call us 9667684409
